description:
Izumi Hayato is a fairly serious individual who is the vice-president of the student council. He is set up with http://anidb.net/ch75361 [Wakana Ui] in an arranged marriage and must live with her in his apartment. Despite his ever-growing respect for Ui throughout the series, he often gets caught in her romantic advances which make him uncomfortable yet aroused. Hayato is notably self-sufficient, having cooked and cleaned for himself prior to Ui`s arrival.
Source: Wikipedia, edited.
name: Izumi Hayato
